text: 22 Nov 2024 The Buzziest Books of November | 2024 Get ready to cozy up with a literary feast this November! As the crisp autumn air settles in, our curated selection of must-read titles is here to keep you warm and inspired. From heartwarming tales of gratitude to thrilling stories that echo the season’s mystery, these captivating reads are perfect for the month of giving thanks. Curious about the books that are sparking conversations this November? Don’t miss our roundup of this month’s most anticipated new releases. Happy reading and happy Thanksgiving vibes! In Still Waters by Natalie Shpet Release Date: October 3 2024 Years ago, in a high school in the quiet town of Austin, Minnesota, a tragic incident occurred. A classmate attacked a boy, slashing his face with a sharp object and leaving a deep scar on his cheek. Years later, a series of horrific murders shakes the peaceful community. One by one, seemingly unconnected individuals fall victim to a mysterious… Buy on Amazon The Next God by b.t. gottfred Release Date: November 1 2024 Nineteen year-old Cyur Good convinces the brilliant and beautiful Madison Pike to travel with him to a mysterious Indiana farm to see if a man claiming to be a god actually is one. Buy on Amazon Of Storm and Shadows by KB Fisher Release Date: November 10 2024 In the summer of 1988, teen Lance Dubois is caught up with Edward Roux’s one and only daughter, Lauren. But more than just a fence divides the wealthy Roux estate from the modest Dubois property. Lance leaves town for some time. Seventeen years later, Hurricane Katrina is hours away—and Lance and Lauren must face the family secrets of their past. Are the intricacies of estate planning overwhelming? Does the idea of ensuring your loved ones’ financial security seem like a daunting task? You’re not alone.” Introducing the ultimate guide to estate planning. Buy on Amazon Dreams That Bind Us (Romancing The Keys Book 3) by Irene Lawless Release Date: November 26 2024 Anna, one of Key West’s top furniture designers, is tormented every night by a man who invades her dreams. James, a billionaire real estate mogul, never expects to be haunted by dreams of a beauty with turquoise eyes. When they meet, they realize their dream lovers are real. And when Anna runs, James becomes obsessed with tracking her down. Buy on Amazon Light Locked (Light Locked Series Book 1) by A.K. Chandler Release Date: October 11 2024 Light Locked is a fantasy romance novel that takes a refreshing twist on familiar themes. With slow burn, enemies to lovers, grumpy sunshine elements, it’s a great fit for fans of Villains and Virtues and From Blood and Ash. Buy on Amazon A Very Bad Thing by J.T. Ellison Release Date: November 1 2024 From New York Times bestselling author J.T. Ellison comes a taut thriller about one author at the pinnacle of her career, whose past threatens to destroy everything she has—and everyone she knows. Buy on Amazon The Mirror: The Lost Bride Trilogy, Book 2 by Nora Roberts Release Date: November 19 2024 In her dreams she sees glimpses of the past. In the present she finds portraits of brides. He recounts an unconventional childhood far from Hollywood. html:
22 Nov 2024

The Buzziest Books of November | 2024

Get ready to cozy up with a literary feast this November! As the crisp autumn air settles in, our curated selection of must-read titles is here to keep you warm and inspired. From heartwarming tales of gratitude to thrilling stories that echo the season’s mystery, these captivating reads are perfect for the month of giving thanks. Curious about the books that are sparking conversations this November? Don’t miss our roundup of this month’s most anticipated new releases. Happy reading and happy Thanksgiving vibes!

In Still Waters

by Natalie Shpet

Release Date: October 3 2024

Years ago, in a high school in the quiet town of Austin, Minnesota, a tragic incident occurred. A classmate attacked a boy, slashing his face with a sharp object and leaving a deep scar on his cheek. Years later, a series of horrific murders shakes the peaceful community. One by one, seemingly unconnected individuals fall victim to a mysterious…

Buy on Amazon

The Next God

by b.t. gottfred

Release Date: November 1 2024

Nineteen year-old Cyur Good convinces the brilliant and beautiful Madison Pike to travel with him to a mysterious Indiana farm to see if a man claiming to be a god actually is one.

Buy on Amazon

Of Storm and Shadows

by KB Fisher

Release Date: November 10 2024

In the summer of 1988, teen Lance Dubois is caught up with Edward Roux’s one and only daughter, Lauren. But more than just a fence divides the wealthy Roux estate from the modest Dubois property. Lance leaves town for some time. Seventeen years later, Hurricane Katrina is hours away—and Lance and Lauren must face the family secrets of their past.

Buy on Amazon

Estate Planning Essentials

by Maxwell Sterling

Release Date: October 6 2024

**Secure Your Legacy and Deliver Tranquility to Your Loved Ones in 5 Effortless Steps** “Discover the keys to estate planning, even if legal terms make you feel lost. Are the intricacies of estate planning overwhelming? Does the idea of ensuring your loved ones’ financial security seem like a daunting task? You’re not alone.” Introducing the ultimate guide to estate planning.

Buy on Amazon

Dreams That Bind Us (Romancing The Keys Book 3)

by Irene Lawless

Release Date: November 26 2024

Anna, one of Key West’s top furniture designers, is tormented every night by a man who invades her dreams. James, a billionaire real estate mogul, never expects to be haunted by dreams of a beauty with turquoise eyes. When they meet, they realize their dream lovers are real. And when Anna runs, James becomes obsessed with tracking her down.

Buy on Amazon

Light Locked (Light Locked Series Book 1)

by A.K. Chandler

Release Date: October 11 2024

Light Locked is a fantasy romance novel that takes a refreshing twist on familiar themes. With slow burn, enemies to lovers, grumpy sunshine elements, it’s a great fit for fans of Villains and Virtues and From Blood and Ash.

Buy on Amazon

A Very Bad Thing

by J.T. Ellison

Release Date: November 1 2024

From New York Times bestselling author J.T. Ellison comes a taut thriller about one author at the pinnacle of her career, whose past threatens to destroy everything she has—and everyone she knows.

Buy on Amazon

The Mirror: The Lost Bride Trilogy, Book 2

by Nora Roberts

Release Date: November 19 2024

In her dreams she sees glimpses of the past. In the present she finds portraits of brides. And when she has visions of an antique mirror, she is drawn to it, sensing it holds dark family secrets.

Buy on Amazon

From Under the Truck: A Memoir

by Josh Brolin

Release Date: November 19 2024

Weaving a latticework of different strands, moving back and forth through time, Josh Brolin captures a life marked by curiosity, pain, devotion, kindness, humor. He recounts an unconventional childhood far from Hollywood.

Buy on Amazon

Citizen: My Life After the White House

by Bill Clinton

Release Date: November 19 2024

A powerful, candid, and richly detailed memoir from an American icon, revealing what life looks like after the presidency: triumphs, tribulations, and all.

Buy on Amazon
